segments.text: Amanda , how do you like this peaked cap ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Didn't you say you want to buy a top hat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I think this one fits me Well . Why don't you try on the sombrero in black ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like caps at all .
segments.speaker: S2
